attributes.action: Reinstate the new Accommodation Policy for the Armed Forces
attributes.additional_details: Reinstating this policy means that housing accommodation is equal and fair, regardless of Rank. Those who have large families would have more opportunities to acquire the housing entitlement they deserve with less houses squandered on higher ranks who do not need that entitlement. I've known large families in the RAF that've been denied their housing entitlement purely because there isn't sufficient housing for their entitlement, while you have higher ranks living well above their entitlement.
attributes.background: We want you to reinstate the new Accommodation Policy for the Armed Forces. Accommodation entitlement should be fair for all, regardless of Rank. Make it fair for all Ranks!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Implement the planned MOD's New Accommodation Offer, which is due in March 2024: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658065
